name: wdnpmp-wp_container_template
description: Docker WordPress Nginx Php-FPM mySql phpMyAdmin

scripts._create_folders: mkdir addon_files/certs addon_files/certs-data addon_files/logs mysql PUBLIC
scripts._stop_and_clean: bash ./addon_files/stop_and_clean.sh  && echo "[>   STOPPED AND CLEANED -:- DONE  <] " && exit 1
scripts._build: npm run _create_folders && npm run _build_containers && echo "[>   BUILD -:- DONE  <] " && exit 1
